page.title: 13Education in Uxbridge
page.content: There are many educational establishments in our area.The primary schools are Whitehall,Oakfarm, Hermitage,St Bernadettes and St Marys Roman Catholic schools and St Andrews Church of England schools.There are between 200 and 500 pupils at these schools aged from 4-11 years.These schools are all mixed.The secondary schools are The Greenway,Vyners, Swakeleys and Abbotsfield.There are between 700-900 pupils at these schools aged from 11-18.There are also several nurseries in this area.An American Community School is on Vine Lane and a Technical College is on Park Road.We also have an Adult Training Centre in Uxbridge,which like the Technical College, offers evening classes in many subjects.Some schools in the area are also used for evening classes.
